metaTitle: RESIDENCIAL SATO San Fulgencio | Bungalows from €233,900
metaDescription: Discover RESIDENCIAL SATO in San Fulgencio, Alicante. Modern 2-3 bed bungalows from €233,900. MEDHOUSES developer. Delivery December 2026. Buy now.

content.heroIntro: RESIDENCIAL SATO represents an exceptional opportunity to own a modern, quality-built bungalow in the sought-after Pueblo area of San Fulgencio, Alicante. Developed by the trusted MEDHOUSES, this exclusive residential complex offers 2-3 bedroom bungalows starting from just €233,900, providing outstanding value in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2026, RESIDENCIAL SATO combines contemporary design, premium finishes, and strategic positioning near beaches, golf courses, and international amenities. The development features a private swimming pool, air conditioning pre-installation, and meticulously landscaped gardens, making it an ideal choice for families, retirees, and investors seeking a Mediterranean lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a holiday home, permanent residence, or investment property with strong rental potential, RESIDENCIAL SATO delivers exceptional quality and value that sets it apart in the current market.

locationSection.intro: San Fulgencio's Pueblo area offers a perfect blend of authentic Spanish charm and modern convenience, attracting an increasingly international community seeking genuine coastal living without the overdevelopment of major tourist hubs. This strategic location provides easy access to the Costa Blanca's most prestigious amenities while maintaining a peaceful, residential atmosphere. The area is home to a thriving expat community where English is commonly spoken, making integration seamless for international buyers. With a Mediterranean climate, excellent healthcare facilities, internationally-recognized schools, and a full range of dining and shopping options, Pueblo represents the ideal balance between lifestyle and practicality. Property values in San Fulgencio have appreciated 8% year-on-year, demonstrating strong market fundamentals, while prices remain 40% lower than comparable Spanish island markets, offering exceptional value for discerning buyers.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby for enthusiasts
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets, local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional Spanish tapas to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: RESIDENCIAL SATO bungalows are constructed to the highest standards by MEDHOUSES, featuring premium materials and meticulous attention to detail throughout. Each property benefits from modern architectural design with spacious interiors, natural light maximization, and energy-efficient specifications. Built to exceed Spanish building codes, these homes represent excellent long-term value with a 10-year structural warranty included as standard. The bungalows showcase contemporary Spanish design principles combined with international quality expectations, ensuring comfort, durability, and aesthetic appeal for years to come.
features: Private communal swimming pool with landscaped surrounds
Modern fitted kitchen with quality appliances
Double glazing with thermal break insulation

content.investmentSection: San Fulgencio presents compelling investment fundamentals with property values rising 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation and demonstrating strong market confidence. RESIDENCIAL SATO properties command rental potential of €800 per week during peak seasons, positioning them attractively within the vacation rental market. The development's completion in December 2026 aligns perfectly with anticipated market appreciation, while early acquisition locks in current pricing before anticipated value increases. At 40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands, RESIDENCIAL SATO offers extraordinary value, particularly for investors seeking portfolio diversification in Europe's most stable property markets. The established international community ensures consistent rental demand from European buyers seeking extended stays, while the appreciating location benefits from ongoing infrastructure improvements and amenity expansions throughout San Fulgencio.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in RESIDENCIAL SATO?
faqs.answer: RESIDENCIAL SATO offers exceptional value starting from €233,900 for 2-3 bedroom bungalows with built sizes ranging from 63-92m². With only 4 units available, pricing reflects early-stage acquisition benefits. Contact our team for current availability and financing options.

faqs.question: When will RESIDENCIAL SATO be completed?
faqs.answer: Delivery is scheduled for December 1st, 2026. MEDHOUSES provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We recommend contacting us directly to discuss specific delivery schedules and completion timelines.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of RESIDENCIAL SATO?
faqs.answer: MEDHOUSES is the developer, bringing years of established expertise in building quality residential properties throughout San Fulgencio and the wider Alicante region. They maintain rigorous construction standards and excellent relationships within the local community.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. The Costa Blanca offers exceptional value, established international communities, excellent amenities, and strong property appreciation. San Fulgencio specifically shows +8% year-on-year growth, while prices remain 40% below Spanish island markets, making it ideal for buyers and investors.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals have full property ownership rights in Spain without restrictions. No visa is required specifically for property purchase. We recommend consulting with a Spanish property lawyer and tax advisor to understand your individual circumstances and obligations.

faqs.question: How far is RESIDENCIAL SATO from the beach?
faqs.answer: RESIDENCIAL SATO is positioned within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches, providing convenient beach access while maintaining the peaceful residential character of Pueblo. The location balances beachside convenience with tranquil living.

faqs.question: What amenities are near RESIDENCIAL SATO?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes with private clinic options; several championship golf courses; and diverse restaurants offering Spanish and international cuisine. An established international community ensures English is widely spoken.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically include: Transfer Tax (IVA) at 10%, notary fees (approximately 1-2%), registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-3% recommended). For RESIDENCIAL SATO at €233,900, total acquisition costs are approximately €30,000-€35,000. Consult a tax professional for precise figures based on your situation.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property taxes (IBI) average 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value, typically €200-€400 annually for properties like those in RESIDENCIAL SATO. Non-resident property owners may face additional taxation. We recommend consulting a Spanish tax advisor for comprehensive guidance on your specific tax obligations.

faqs.question: Is RESIDENCIAL SATO suitable for rental investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, properties achieve approximately €800 per week rental income during peak seasons. The established expat community and tourist proximity create consistent demand. With appreciation trending at +8% annually plus rental yields, RESIDENCIAL SATO presents attractive combined returns for investment-focused buyers.

content.conclusion: RESIDENCIAL SATO represents a rare opportunity to acquire premium Costa Blanca property in a thriving international community at exceptional value. With only 4 units available, MEDHOUSES has created an exclusive development combining modern comfort, investment potential, and Mediterranean lifestyle in one compelling package. Starting from €233,900 with completion in December 2026, properties are appreciating at +8% annually while rental yields provide immediate income potential. Whether seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or portfolio diversification, RESIDENCIAL SATO delivers uncompromising quality at prices 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. San Fulgencio's strategic location offers convenient access to beaches, golf, healthcare, and international schools while maintaining authentic Spanish character. Don't miss this exceptional opportunity in one of Europe's most desirable property markets. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone today to discuss your RESIDENCIAL SATO investment and secure your future on the Costa Blanca.
